013    package net.sf.oval.exception;
014    
015    /**
016     * @author Sebastian Thomschke
017     */
018    public class ExpressionEvaluationException extends OValException
019    {
020            private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
021    
022            public ExpressionEvaluationException(final String message)
023            {
024                    super(message);
025            }
026    
027            public ExpressionEvaluationException(final String message, final Throwable cause)
028            {
029                    super(message, cause);
030            }
031    }
